about.title: Who I am
about.subtitle: 10+ years turning data into decisions that move businesses forward.
about.body_1: I design and build modern data architectures that scale. Certified Databricks specialist â€” my playground includes Delta Lake, Unity Catalog, Delta Live Tables, and MLflow. I apply rigorous governance, intelligent automation, and data quality in enterprise environments processing petabytes.
about.body_2: I lead cross-functional squads to deliver data-driven platforms that accelerate time-to-insight. Bronze to gold: dimensional modeling (Kimball, Star Schema), robust orchestration (Databricks Workflows, Airflow, dbt), and ML in production. Cloud-native on GCP and Azure â€” I build for scale, performance, and optimized costs.
about.bullet_1: Modern Lakehouses that unify analytics and ML
about.bullet_2: End-to-end governance with Unity Catalog and automated lineage
about.bullet_3: High-performance teams with DevOps culture and data quality
about.tagline: Build data infrastructure that doesn't break when the business scales 10x.

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.subtitle: Feedback from leaders and partners throughout the journey.

rafael_carvalho.text:
OtÃ¡vio was a key player in building HeroSpark's data infrastructure. With top-tier technical expertise and a strong focus on best practices and standards, he helped lay the foundation that now ensures robust data analysis and strategic decision-making.

Beyond his deep knowledge of data architecture, what truly stands out about OtÃ¡vio is his speed and willingness to help. He was always ready to collaborate, find efficient solutions, and ensure everything was structured for the company's long-term growth.

If you're looking for a highly skilled professional who delivers fast and with excellence, OtÃ¡vio is the one! ðŸš€

allan_ribeiro.text: Proactivity, commitment, efficiency, and reliability are some of OtÃ¡vio's many qualities. An exceptional professional who always sought to improve. Quick to solve problems and attentive to clarifying doubts. Not only that, but also a friendly person to live with in the daily work routine.

lucas_brandao.text: OtÃ¡vio is the type of pro who really knows how to lead a team to new skills and challenges, all in the most motivated way possible. He's got a massive experience in the field, and he's fantastic at guiding and encouraging beginners like nobody else. Plus, he's really passionate about technology - you can see it in the authority he proves when coding or discussing multiple stacks.

fernando_viegas.text:
OtÃ¡vio is an excellent professional. He helped me a lot at the beginning of my career in the Data field. He gave me confidence and helped me develop as a Data Engineer.

A guy who is very dedicated to the project and extremely trustworthy. OtÃ¡vio directly participated in the creation of our Data team and helped create/promote the Data Driven culture in our company.

guilherme_maduro.text: Don is the typical partner who solves absolutely any problem. It's a huge relief to know that I can count on him working on a task because it's guaranteed that it will be solved, regardless of complexity.

jaquelyne_kelm.text: I worked with OtÃ¡vio in the Customer Success area, where I was able to follow the improvements and continuous evolution implemented in the team's operations. An excellent professional, with good analytical skills and great knowledge in data manipulation. His commitment to work is unquestionable.
